definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">player_log_in</field><next><block type="controls_if"><mutation else="1"></mutation><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">OR</field><value name="A"><block type="is_mod_loaded"><value name="modid"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">polytone</field></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="is_mod_loaded"><value name="modid"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">optifine</field></block></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="variables_set_logic"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">global:visualModMissing</field><value name="VAL"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value><next><block type="console_log"><field name="message_type">debug</field><value name="message"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Polytone or Optifine detected!</field></block></value></block></next></block></statement><statement name="ELSE"><block type="variables_set_logic"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">global:visualModMissing</field><value name="VAL"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value><next><block type="console_log"><field name="message_type">warn</field><value name="message"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Neither Polytone or Optifine are loaded! This will cause issues with rendering aspects of the mod!</field></block></value><next><block type="entity_open_gui"><field name="guiname">ModMissingScreen</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="x"><block type="entity_pos_x"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="y"><block type="entity_pos_y"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="z"><block type="entity_pos_z"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
